title: Laurent Pichon
summary: Laurent Pichon (born 19 July 1986) is a French racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam Arkéa–Samsic. He was named in the start list for the 2015 Vuelta a España. In June 2017, he was named in the startlist for the Tour de France. He was the winner of the 2017 French Road Cycling Cup.
